titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The government of St. Vincent and the Grenadines has no systematic process for the declassification of documents.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Commerce and Trade: Administrative Building, Bay Street, Kingstown, St.Vincent.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should write directly to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to request access to particular documents.

p.ref: Government of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
